mapper.insert: insert into backschool_information (backSchool_id, backSchool_time, backSchool_vehicle, report_id) values (null, #{backschoolTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{backschoolVehicle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reportId,jdbcType=INTEGER})
